articles.author: Hilary Mitchell
articles.title: Bambie Thug takes aim at Eurovision organisers: 'F**k the EBU' - PinkNews
articles.description: Irish Eurovision entrant Bambie Thug has furiously hit out at the European Broadcasting Union following the final, saying: "F**k the EBU".
articles.content: Irish Eurovision entrant Bambie Thug, who came sixth in last night’s Grand Final, has furiously hit out at the European Broadcasting Union in a heated statement following the 2024 event, saying: “F**… [+3974 chars]
